body.name: Waterproof Digital Camera with 32GB Card HD 1080P 36MP Compact Digital Camera for Kids Point and Shoot Camera Portable Camera for Teens Students Boys Girls Seniors
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 36 mins
features: 💝【Waterproof Digital Camera】Rawiemy waterproof digital camera can shooting HD1080P video and 36MP image resolution,helping you capture and record the most exciting memorable moments with high-quality images or videos, It equipped with 2.8 Inch IPS LCD screen,8X digital zoom, rechargeable battery and 32G SD card. Great for travelling,family party,studying.

💝【16.5FT(5m)Underwater Camera】You can use this underwater digital camera dive up to 16.5feet(5m) in underwater world. Not worry about damage by the child dropping it into water. It is ideal for water sports, including swimming, drifting, surfing, snorkeling etc. Perfect gift for kids/ beginners/ students/ seniors record their lovely moments.

💝【Multifuctional Digital Camera】This digital camera for kids supports 8x digital zoom, You can zoom in or zoom out the subject by pressing the W/T button. The pause function allows you to pause when record or playback videos. And the built-in fill light helps you to take quality pictures in the dark. This portable digital camera also featured with Panorama /Face Detect /Smile capture /Continuous Shooting /Anti-Shaking /ISO brightness /Self-timer /TV output / USB 2.0 ect.

💝【32G TF Card & Webcam】This compact digital camera equipped with video mode and a built-in microphone, you can record more stable and smooth videos. This rechargeable digital camera for teens can also be used as a webcam, so you can make video calls or live stream and share your life on social media. The small camera included USB cable and 32GB TF Card(include) support the transfer of photos and videos from the camera to your computer for timely photo collection and storage.

💝【Charming Appearance】Based on kids preferences, This kids camera design colour with red and sports car appearance, Deeply loved by boys, girls, Once you have this portable camera, you will be fondle admiringly. It is smaller than iphone, Weighing only 0.5lb, This pocket camera is lightweight with high-class materials for kids and teens to hand-held, Easy to carry it anywhere with you.

💝【Perfect Gift for Kids & Warm Service】This kids digital camera desig with stylish, it's a great birthday or christmas gift for boys and girls. include a 32GB TF card, use cable, rechargeable battery; This children mini camera can be charged with power bank or PC, support shooting while charging.
body.description: Warm Tips 1. Waterproof capability: Underwater 16.5FT for one hour per time, please take out battery to keep it dry while not using. 2. Please format the card on the camera before the first use. Self-Timer: 2/5/10 seconds Continuous Shot: 1/2/3/5/10 Flash Mode: auto/on/off Video File Format: AVI PC interface: Mini USB 2.0 Power Source: 1050mAH Rechargeable Li-Ion Battery Supported O/S: Microsoft Windows XP, Vista, Win7, Mac10.5.8

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Waterproof Digital Camera HD 1080P 36MP Kids Digital Camera with 32G SD Card This kids camera is a nice and perfect gift for family and friends who love outdoor water activities. It is an entry level and good beginner's camera/camcorder. It can do good job at snorkeling, surfing, and tumbling through the waves and it is suitable for diving in the pool, lakes, and family gatherings.

Packing List Waterproof Camera*1 Battery*1 32G SD card*1 USB cable*1 Velvet Pouch*1 User manual*1 Warm Tips 1. Waterproof capability: Underwater 16.5FT for one hour per time, please take out battery to keep it dry while not using. 2. Please format the card on the camera before the first use. Self-Timer: 2/5/10 seconds Continuous Shot: 1/2/3/5/10 Flash Mode: auto/on/off Video File Format: AVI PC interface: Mini USB 2.0 Power Source: 1050mAH Rechargeable Li-Ion Battery Supported O/S: Microsoft Windows XP, Vista, Win7, Mac10.5.8

Digital Camera with Flash Light The flash light provides auxiliary light when shooting in no light/weak light conditions to obtain reasonable picture material. Help you take quality photos and videos Self Timer You can set a countdown before taking pictures at 2 seconds/ 5 seconds/10 seconds. It can easily take a self-portrait or group photo for you.(More convenient when combined with tripod) Beauty& Smile & Face Detection Use the smile capture and Face Detection to record every exciting moment and the truest reaction of your boys and girls. Turn on the Beauty of the camera and show the charm in front of the world

Pocket Camera This mini camera is compact, durable and lightweight, which can be easily put in your pocket. There is one spot for a strap loop so you never worry about the camera dropping while kids playing. Besides, the package comes with a lanyard and a velvet pouch. Anti Shake Function This camera for teens adopts 6-Axis anti-shake technology to effectively compensate for shake from 12 directions in 6 axes (up and down, front and back, left and right, horizontal, rotation, vertical,), which will improve stabilization while recording. How to Download pictures & charge? Come with USB cable, you can connect the digital camera with computer to download images and videos you recorded. You can also charge on the power bank at any time, without worrying about battery drains

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super easy, perfect for kids
reviews.reviewText: Practical, the camera is easy to operate, allows even beginners to take clear photos, and can be used quickly and independently. Fast delivery and beautifully packaged. Great purchase! The camera is overall good and the photos it takes are great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars camera is light and easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: It has good performance and takes clear photos. The battery life is great and I've used it a lot so far without needing to charge it. I'm really impressed with the compact size!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Digital camera is clear
reviews.reviewText: Easy to slip into pocket and pull out when ready to use. Great value for money, very functional camera, bought this for my granddaughter's birthday, she loves it and the color

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my 8 year old!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this camera for my 8 year old son who loves taking pictures and videos. The quality isn’t bad for the price. This will be perfect for when we go snorkeling in the lakes and rivers this summer. He filled the sink with water to take underwater pictures of his water animals. It’s easy to use, pretty straight forward. I would recommend this camera for kids 6 years and up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Impressive little camera
reviews.reviewText: Great quality photos! I am actually very impressed with the sharp clear crisp photos this tiny little camera captures. I had sent back 4 different cameras all for 100 dollars, ended up purchasing this for real cheap and it blows the $100 cameras outta the park! I have to still try the video but the zoom and the quality of the photos gave me high hopes for the video quality. I'm very excited to use this more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Waterproof gift for kids
reviews.reviewText: The camera is waterproof. It makes a great gift for kids because they can use it for pictures and videos even if they are not allowed to have a phone. Parents don't have to worry about it getting wet. Kids took pictures during the rain and when it was snowing. Great for vacation, beach day and pool activities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice camera for the price
reviews.reviewText: We bought this camera for our 7 year old son for Christmas. He loves taking pictures but because of his age we didn’t want to spend a lot of money on a camera. I’m pleasantly surprised by the image quality and the durability of this inexpensive camera. I’m considering buying another one for myself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not look like picture
reviews.reviewText: The camera we received does not look like this picture. It is plastic. It works ok but the buttons and such are not intuitive and hard to get to work. The kids like playing with it but personally we would not recommend it. Made in China.
